item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2013/01/08/automattic-in-2012/#comment-3978">lauramoncur</a>.
Thanks! Hard to believe it has been over 5 years since we moved out here.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to lauramoncur.

Thanks! Hard to believe it has been over 5 years since we moved out here.

item.title: By: lauramoncur
item.dc:creator: lauramoncur
item.description: I'm so glad that Matt is having such success! I'm also glad that you came to Utah. We need as many great people as we can recruit!
item.content:encoded: I’m so glad that Matt is having such success! I’m also glad that you came to Utah. We need as many great people as we can recruit!
